title: South Korea
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 389 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 590L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     T and Y
description: South Korea may be small, but its people have strong values and a proud culture that have turned the country into a global power. Students will be excited to learn about this amazing country.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
